alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 26 at 11:13PM MST until June 27 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Arizona, including the following county, La Paz. * WHEN...Until 215 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Running washes may flow over roadways including Highway 72. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1113 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Bouse Wash and Osborne Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bouse. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
